mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_compost( username, company_contract_idx, company_info_idx, inventory_idx, order_compost_amount, order_compost_phone, order_compost_address, order_compost_content, order_compost_date) VALUES(#{userId},#{companyContractIdx},#{companyInfoIdx},#{InventoryIdx},#{amount},#{phone},#{address},#{message},now());
mapper.select: SELECT ci.inventory_idx as inventoryIdx, ci.company_info_idx as companyInfoIdx, cc.company_contract_idx as companyContractIdx FROM company_contract cc INNER JOIN company_info ci ON ci.company_info_idx = cc.company_info_idx INNER JOIN inventory i ON i.inventory_idx = ci.inventory_idx WHERE ci.username = #{userId};

SELECT ci.company_info_name AS companyInfoName, oc.order_compost_phone AS orderCompostPhone, oc.order_compost_address AS orderCompostAddress, oc.order_compost_amount AS orderCompostAmount, oc.order_compost_date AS orderCompostDate, COALESCE(occ.order_compost_confirm_status, '대기중') AS orderCompostConfirmStatus FROM order_compost oc LEFT JOIN order_compost_confirm occ ON oc.order_compost_idx = occ.order_compost_confirm_idx LEFT JOIN company_info ci ON ci.company_idx = oc.company_info_idx WHERE ci.username = #{userId};

SELECT ci.company_info_name AS companyInfoName, oc.order_compost_phone AS orderCompostPhone, oc.order_compost_address AS orderCompostAddress, oc.order_compost_amount AS orderCompostAmount, oc.order_compost_date AS orderCompostDate, ocd.order_compost_delivery_status AS orderCompostDeliveryStatus FROM order_compost_delivery ocd INNER JOIN company_info ci ON ci.company_info_idx = ocd.company_info_idx INNER JOIN order_compost oc ON oc.order_compost_idx = ocd.order_compost_idx WHERE ocd.username = #{userId};
